summary.span: 当实现时，对 值进行动画处理的抽象类。

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed object GetCurrentValue (object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetCurrentValue(object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
Public Overrides NotOverridable Function GetCurrentValue (defaultOriginValue As Object, defaultDestinationValue As Object, animationClock As AnimationClock) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ GetCurrentValue(System::Object ^ defaultOriginValue, System::Object ^ defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);
override this.GetCurrentValue : obj * obj * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> obj

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 动画将使用可以生成 或 值的 来生成其输出值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.
The current value of the animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultOriginValue` 参数的值取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且它替换另一个动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是在替换动画时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为组合链中前一个动画返回的值，该元素具有不 的 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue` 参数的值取决于是否存在 组合层的上一个属性。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有 组合层的上一个属性，则 `defaultDestinationValue` 是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层，`defaultDestinationValue` 是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultOriginValue` 参数的值取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且它替换另一个动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是在替换动画时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为组合链中前一个动画返回的值，该元素具有不 的 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue` 参数的值取决于是否存在 组合层的上一个属性。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有 组合层的上一个属性，则 `defaultDestinationValue` 是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层，`defaultDestinationValue` 是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultOriginValue` 参数的值取决于动画在组合链中的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation's position in the composition chain: - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且它替换另一个动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 是在替换动画时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画位于组合链中的第一个位置，并且不存在要替换的动画，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合链的第一个位置，则 `defaultOriginValue` 为组合链中前一个动画返回的值，该元素具有不 的 。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue` 参数的值取决于是否存在 组合层的上一个属性。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果有 组合层的上一个属性，则 `defaultDestinationValue` 是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有上一个组合层，`defaultDestinationValue` 是要进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview).
